summary: Experienced and safety-focused heavy vehicle driver with over 20 years of experience in transporting passengers and goods safely, conducting vehicle inspections, and maintaining accurate logs. Skilled in electrical installations, adaptable, with strong problem-solving skills and excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

experience.title: Heavy Duty Trailer Driver
bullets: Responsible for transporting re(cid:976)inery equipment and operating ITI Kalgidhar (Pvt.), 40 feet heavy tractor-trailer trucks with a maximum capacity of 35 tonne.

experience.title: Bus Driver
bullets: Conduct pre-trip inspections to ensure safe operation of the 66 seater bus. Maintain accurate records of daily logs, incident reports, and maintenance checklists.

experience.title: Heavy Duty Trailer Driver
bullets: Responsible for transporting re(cid:976)inery equipment and operating 40 feet heavy tractor-trailer trucks with a maximum capacity of 25 tonne.

experience.title: Electrician
bullets: Provided timely and efficient transportation services, enhancing technology-based customer satisfaction. Ensured the safe handling and navigation of passengers within the hospital premises. Safety Practices and Problem-solving.
